about_the_game:
The game follows John Hill, a 42-year-old retired detective suffering from post-traumatic stress syndrome following the suicide of his wife.

After a series of hallucinations John is trapped in “A Simple Door” which this time manifests itself as a 1970's television studio, forcing John to go through a series of atrocious and repulsive scenarios created by his own mind, thus making John face his own personal hell now called “A Simple Door”.

Try to escape from “A Simple Door” by facing your past, your darkest secrets and your fears through the doors.

Use your walkman and your intellect to solve the puzzles and escape from “A Simple Door”

first person psychological horror game, solve puzzles and immerse yourself in this universe.
